input.sentences: dinner was great at the restaurant last night .
we had a lot of tasty drinks .
the food was brought out on a wooden board and there was a lot of it .
we had some wine as well .
afterward we decided to order some dessert .
output.sentences: My boyfriend calls about going to this new restaurant for dinner who is featured for their use of local produce.
I agreed and everything from the main dish to the sides and drinks(even sauces!) were delicious and fresh; needless to say we ate quite a lot.
When our food arrived it was a lot of shrimp in one serving on an earthy wooden platter.
We also ordered a bottle of wine that paired very well with the food.
I'm not sure how we had the room, but we decided to order dessert too.
